#  Driver Education

## Page Navigation

  * Driver's Education

  * Great Falls Public Schools
  * Parents & Students
  * Driver Education
  * Driver's Education

# Welcome to the Driver's Education Page!

  * 

  * # **Drivers Education Update!**

    * **Click here to register!**
    * **Spring (January) Drivers Education Letter**
    * **2023-2024 Session dates. All dates are subject to change. Please check the schedule frequently.  Thank you.**

## **Drivers Education Sign Up Link**

If you have questions, please contact Beckie Frisbee at
beckie_frisbee@gfps.k12.mt.us.

OUR MISSION STATEMENT:  To educate and prepare our students to meet the
challenges of safely operating a vehicle; teach best-practices in the skills
of maneuvering any vehicle; and educate our youth about the proper use of seat
belts, and the dangers of distracted driving, including the use of hand-held
devices, driving under the influence, and drowsy driving.

OUR INSTRUCTORS: All of our instructors have many years of instruction in the
classroom and in the vehicle. Click on the name of the instructor to go to
their information page.

* * *

Click here for questions regarding the Graduated Driver License.  
Click here for Driver Education Resources.  
Click here to make an appointment regarding your written test and/or licensing
procedure.



# Contact Us

  * **Driver Education Office**  
Dennis Martin (406) 268-6020

**OUR INSTRUCTORS:** All of our instructors have many years of instruction in
the classroom and in the vehicle. Click on the name of the instructor to go to
their information page.

Tony Swartz  
Mick Davis  
Jerry Olson  
Derik Senger  
Betsy Rogstad  
Skip Garza  
Hannah Hartman
